description: Get information about your IPAM pools. For more information, see What is IPAM? in the Amazon VPC IPAM User Guide.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters for the request. For more information about filtering, see Filtering CLI output. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values.

parameters.name: IpamIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the IPAMs you want information on. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.

nested_items.name: Ipams
nested_items.description: Information about the IPAMs.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the owner of the IPAM.

nested_items.name: IpamId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IPAM.

nested_items.name: IpamArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IPAM.

nested_items.name: IpamRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region of the IPAM.

nested_items.name: PublicDefaultScopeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IPAM's default public scope.

nested_items.name: PrivateDefaultScopeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IPAM's default private scope.

nested_items.name: ScopeCount
nested_items.description: The number of scopes in the IPAM. The scope quota is 5. For more information on quotas, see Quotas in IPAM in the Amazon VPC IPAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the IPAM.

nested_items.name: OperatingRegions
nested_items.description: The operating Regions for an IPAM. Operating Regions are Amazon Web Services Regions where the IPAM is allowed to manage IP address CIDRs. IPAM only discovers and monitors resources in the Amazon Web Services Regions you select as operating Regions.

nested_items.name: RegionName
nested_items.description: The name of the operating Region.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the IPAM.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The key/value combination of a tag assigned to the resource. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all resources that have a tag with the key Owner and the value TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceDiscoveryId
nested_items.description: The IPAM's default resource discovery ID.

nested_items.name: DefaultResourceDiscoveryAssociationId
nested_items.description: The IPAM's default resource discovery association ID.

nested_items.name: ResourceDiscoveryAssociationCount
nested_items.description: The IPAM's resource discovery association count.

nested_items.name: StateMessage
nested_items.description: The state message.

nested_items.name: Tier
nested_items.description: IPAM is offered in a Free Tier and an Advanced Tier. For more information about the features available in each tier and the costs associated with the tiers, see Amazon VPC pricing > IPAM tab.

nested_items.name: EnablePrivateGua
nested_items.description: Enable this option to use your own GUA ranges as private IPv6 addresses. This option is disabled by default.

nested_items.name: MeteredAccount
nested_items.description: A metered account is an Amazon Web Services account that is charged for active IP addresses managed in IPAM. For more information, see Enable cost distribution in the Amazon VPC IPAM User Guide.
ipam-owner (default): The Amazon Web Services account which owns the IPAM is charged for all active IP addresses managed in IPAM.
resource-owner: The Amazon Web Services account that owns the IP address is charged for the active IP address.
